description: This file is a demonstration script for using the ApifyTools within an agent to perform web scraping and data extraction tasks, showcasing various prompts and tool integrations.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent capable of executing instructions with specified tools.

classes.name: ApifyTools
classes.description: A tool class providing access to various Apify actors for web scraping tasks.

methods.name: demonstrate_tools
methods.description: Function that demonstrates the usage of ApifyTools with various prompts.
